content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at position(-23.0, -66.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position(-25.0, -64.0) connected to a transport belt network
- Stone Furnace at position(-23.0, -66.0) with a current inventory of 80 iron plates
- Transport Belt Group connecting the mining drill to the furnace

### Iron Ore Storage Facility at position(-14.5, -54.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position(-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore
- Wooden Chest at position(-14.5, -54.5) storing 177 units of iron ore

### Iron Plate Smelting Facility at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0) with a current inventory of 66 iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position(1.5, 0.5) connected to the furnace
- Burner Inserter at position(2.5, 0.5) waiting for source items

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at position(52.5, -84.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position(53.0, -83.0) extracting coal
- Wooden Chest at position(52.5, -84.5) storing 110 units of coal

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without having them in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity.

### Assertion Errors when retrieving entity data
- Verify the entity's existence and ensure its data is up-to-date before attempting to retrieve or update it.
